snippet: Dozens of soccer players signed a statement protesting the decision to stage the European Under-21 Championship in Israel next year after the country’s recent military offensive in the Gaza Strip.
lead_paragraph: Dozens of soccer players signed a statement protesting the decision to stage the European Under-21 Championship in Israel next year after the country’s recent military offensive in the Gaza Strip.

headline.seo: Soccer Players Protest European Under-21 Championship Tournament in Israel
